title: Vice President Biden Hosts Conference Calls With Governors And Local Officials To Discuss Recovery Act Implementation 05/13/2009 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 13, 2009

 



Vice President Biden Hosts Conference Calls With Governors And Local Officials To Discuss Recovery Act Implementation 05/13/2009




THE WHITE HOUSE  Office of the Vice President _____________________________________________ FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE               May 13, 2009  VICE PRESIDENT BIDEN HOSTS CONFERENCE CALLS WITH GOVERNORS AND LOCAL OFFICIALS TO DISCUSS RECOVERY ACT IMPLEMENTATION Earlier today, the Vice President hosted two conference calls with Governors and Mayors/County Executives from across the country to discuss implementation of the Recovery Act. The following elected officials participated: GOVERNORS:  Governor Haley Barbour (R-MS) Governor Brad Henry (D-OK) Governor Mark Parkinson (D-KS) Governor Bill Richardson (D-NM) Governor Mark Sanford (R-SC)  MAYORS / COUNTY EXECUTIVES:  Mayor Bob Coble (D – Columbia, SC) Mayor Michael Coleman (D – Columbus, OH) Mayor Bob Forrest (R – Carlsbad, NM) Mayor John Peyton (R – Jacksonville, FL) Mayor Ed Tauer (R – Aurora, CO) County Executive Maggie Brooks (R – Monroe County, NY) County Commissioner Keith Langenhahn (D – Marathon County, WI)  ###
